en_lang: Ọgụ a na-eti maka ikpe ziri ezi agwụla - ọtụtụ na-ewute ndị ọchịchị.
lang_en: The battle for justice is over - many are upset with the authorities.

en_lang: Mkpebi nke ọchịchị na-ekwupụta ebumnuche kpatara ya.
lang_en: The government’s decision articulates the underlying motive.

en_lang: Ndị obodo ahụ nwere nchegbu maka ịgafe mgbanwe ndị achọrọ dị ukwuu.
lang_en: The community is concerned about going through the much-needed changes.

en_lang: Lọ ọrụ ahụ chepụtara akwụkwọ na-akọwa mgbaghara ha maka ntaramahụhụ ọnwụ.
lang_en: The employer devised a document explaining their apology for the death penalty.

en_lang: Enweghị ihe ọ bụla nke nkwado nke arịrịọ ahụ
lang_en: There was no support for the request

en_lang: Onye isi oche ahụ gbara ndị ozi ya ume ka ha gbachi nkịtị dị ka onye na-akwado nkwado mmegide maka atụmatụ akụ na ụba ya na-achọ ikechi.
lang_en: The president urged his ministers to remain silent as a pro-opposition advocate for his economic plans seeks to close.

en_lang: Ndị juru vootu ahụ hụrụ ka ụgwọ a gafere.
lang_en: The voters saw the bill passed.

en_lang: Nkwupụta okwu a nke ọkàiwu gbanwere ndị juri ahụ.
lang_en: The prosecutor's statement changed the jury.

en_lang: ụlọ ikpe nyere iwu ka e mee ihe ike!
Ihe mgbochi EU megidere nnabata mgbochi mgbochi.
Ndụmọdụ aghụghọ ahụ nyere ha otuto zuru oke.
lang_en: The deceptive advice gave them complete praise.

en_lang: Agencylọ ọrụ gig-akụ na ụba kpebiri ịkwalite nkwụghachi!
lang_en: The gig-economy company has decided to promote a rebate!

en_lang: Ndị so n’òtù ndị na-emegide ọchịchị ọchịchị Chineke kwaturu ndị ọgbọ ha nọ n’ọchịchị!
lang_en: Opposition groups called for a boycott of the assembly.

en_lang: Ndị aghụghọ ahụ jiri nkụda mmụọ kpebiri ịlụ ọgụ na ndị colonialist.
lang_en: Frustrated, the conspirators decided to fight the colonialists.
